fullText: Patti LuPone commands the stage with ferocious intensity in Terrence McNally's 'Master Class,' delivering a tour-de-force performance as Maria Callas that makes this revival essential theater.
dtliExcerpt: Patti LuPone commands the stage with ferocious intensity in Terrence McNally's 'Master Class,' delivering a tour-de-force performance as Maria Callas that makes this revival essential theater.
bwwExcerpt: It should be no surprise that someone with six Emmys and a Tony is an accomplished actor, but Tyne Daly is doing something extraordinary in Master Class...Bottom Line: Tyne Daly's mercurial performance gives equal exposure to her character's formidable outer shell and to the corrosive solitude within.
showScoreExcerpt: Patti LuPone commands the stage with ferocious intensity in Terrence McNally's 'Master Class,' delivering a tour-de-force performance as Maria Callas that makes this revival essential theater.
